lines.speaker: Camarade
text: You mission is to steal what the eye is guarding below itself without being seen.
The eye is a powerful guardian that can spot you from afar.
Its vision is represented by the light cone around it.
If you enter this cone, the eye will see you and the mission will fail.

lines.speaker: Camarade
text: On the gamepad, you can control the camera with the right joystick.
You have two modes for the camera control. They define the default camera direction:
Character mode: the camera follows your character's facing direction.
Eye Mode: the camera aims the eye.
Press the indicated button to switch between the two modes.

lines.speaker: Camarade
text: Now, you have one minute to sneak past the eye and reach the treasure below it.
Try to be quite. The top bar on screen indicates how much noise you are making.
The timer starts as soon as you move your first leg. Good luck!
